title: My Lg Solo android was stolen. Can still locate after factory reset with IMEI or SIM?
content: Find my device located my LG SOLO last seen 3 days ago. Can I still locate itveith IMEI OR SIM #. I think it may have been secure through FIND MY DEVICE. It was at 15% then. Now just says seen 3 days ago. If it did secure my phone can someone unlock it?
